title: 15 Fashion Bestsellers From Nordstrom Our Editors Suggest Grabbing ASAP
description: As shopping editors, we know all the best secrets for navigating Nordstrom's site to find standout styles (and even better deals). It's our job to uncover top-rated products, and Nordstrom certainly doesn't disappoint. Right now is a great time to score some of the brand's most popular pieces at prices you'll love - especially the ones on sale. If you find yourself in the market to update your closet with a new clothing item or even a top-rated pair of shoes, we have more than a few suggestions. We've curated products that are not only trending, but included in our own personal favorites as well, with many being highly discounted. Below, we've laid them all out for you - because, after all, what are shopping fairy godmothers for? Nordstrom recently released tons of new products under $50 to the sale section that are sure to sell out quickly, plus a few cult-favorite pieces that are hard enough to find in stock. From a top-rated swimsuit to stylish dresses and editor-loved sunglasses, these pieces are designed to live in your closet for the longterm - even as they endure multiple trend changes and TikTok aesthetics. Check out the best Nordstrom clothes and accessories that customers are currently loving from the retailer ahead, and buy them before they're gone.
author: Kyley Warren

html:
While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.

As shopping editors, we know all the best secrets for navigating Nordstrom's site to find standout styles (and even better deals). It's our job to uncover top-rated products, and Nordstrom certainly doesn't disappoint. Right now is a great time to score some of the brand's most popular pieces at prices you'll love — especially the ones on sale.

If you find yourself in the market to update your closet with a new clothing item or even a top-rated pair of shoes, we have more than a few suggestions. We've curated products that are not only trending, but included in our own personal favorites as well, with many being highly discounted. Below, we've laid them all out for you — because, after all, what are shopping fairy godmothers for?

Nordstrom recently released tons of new products under $50 to the sale section that are sure to sell out quickly, plus a few cult-favorite pieces that are hard enough to find in stock. From a top-rated swimsuit to stylish dresses and editor-loved sunglasses, these pieces are designed to live in your closet for the longterm — even as they endure multiple trend changes and TikTok aesthetics.

Check out the best Nordstrom clothes and accessories that customers are currently loving from the retailer ahead, and buy them before they're gone.

Best Denim Cutoff Shorts

BP. '90s High Waist Cutoff Denim Shorts ($30, originally $50)

Every summer capsule wardrobe needs a solid pair of raw-hem denim shorts, and this vintage-inspired option from BP. is the gold standard. Made from premium, non-stretch denim with a high waist and relaxed fit, it's a classic piece you'll reach for all season.

Best Sunglasses

Aire Whirlpool 53mm Aviator Sunglasses ($49)

If you've been searching for the perfect pair of vintage-inspired aviator sunglasses, the search is over — at least according to our editor, that is. She tested out this tortoiseshell pair and rated it five stars for its shape, soft lens tint, and subtle pattern. Read more about why she loves these sunglasses in this Aire Whirlpool 53mm Aviator Sunglasses review.

Editor Quote: "I've tried on pairs of aviator sunglasses under $20 that definitely looked their price — I blame the high-gloss shine of the plastic, the thin frames, and the all-wrong lens shapes — but these look much more expensive than they are. When people compliment them, I'm almost giddy to share the price. At less than $50, I honestly consider them a steal." — AE

Best Wire-Free Bra

Wacoal Comfort First Wire Free T-Shirt Bra ($68)

Not only is this bra's wire-free construction incredibly comfortable, but it also looks fantastic under a T-shirt. It has brushed fabric that feels soft on the skin and foam-lined cups that help to shape and smooth. We love the pretty eggshell blue color, too.

Best Low-Heeled Sandals

Jeffrey Campbell Head West Mule ($80, originally $160)

For easy, low heels that will instantly dress up everything from linen shorts to jeans, these suede mules from Jeffrey Campbell are a hot commodity. They come in three colors that range from creamy neutrals to a pretty blue.

Best Denim Dress

Modenaire Zip Front Sleeveless Denim Midi Dress ($90, originally $98)

The V-neckline, smocked waist, and A-line skirt work together to create a flattering silhouette. We love how the front zipper works double time, adding a flash of metallic while also making it a cinch to get dressed.

Best Linen Pants

Madewell Barrel Leg Crop Linen Pants ($98)

For a twist on classic linen pants, we're loving the trending silhouette of this barrel-leg option from Madewell. It has a stretchy elastic waist in the back for extra comfort and also comes in a rich brown tone.

Best Bathing Suit

Andie The Mailbu One-Piece Swimsuit ($112)

One of Andie's most popular swimsuit styles, this one-piece offers plenty of coverage when you need it and less when you don't. The other bonus? You don't have to worry about getting sunscreen on hard-to-reach places, like your back.

Best Ballet Flats

Sam Edelman Marcie Ballet Flat ($130)

The woven element lends a distinctly boho vibe to these ballet flats. The delicate bow is just the cherry on top! They come in five colors, but you can't get more classic than black.

Best Jumpsuit

Vuori Pose Scoop Jumpsuit ($148)

This stretchy, ribbed jumpsuit has a built-in bra, so it's beyond convenient to throw on for days when you want to be comfortable but not sloppy. It comes in three neutral colors, including this black option.

Best Bucket Hat

Lack of Color Raffia Bucket Hat ($149)

The ideal hat when you need a little extra sun coverage without looking like you're heading to the beach. It comes in three different sizes, so you can find the perfect fit.

Best Leather Tote Bag

Madewell Handwoven Leather Tote ($198)

It's hard to believe that this handwoven leather tote is less than $200, considering you can easily haul a laptop and any other on-the-go items for work commutes or traveling. The interior zipper pocket helps to keep smaller valuables like keys and cash organized and accessible. You can choose from three colors.

— Additional reporting by Angela Elias and Balim Tezel

Kyley Warren (she/her) is an award-winning writer and editor with more than four years of experience in the publishing space. She previously worked as an assistant editor on PS Shopping and is an expert on all things related to shopping and fashion. Before joining PS, Kyley worked with Entertainment Tonight as a style commerce writer, and her byline has appeared in publications globally.

Angela Elias (she/her) is a contributing editor for PS Shopping, where she reviews everything from beauty products to kitchen gadgets, curates can't-miss sales, and creates "best of" shopping roundups. In her former roles at PS, she led the relaunch of its Latine identity and family-focused verticals, directed its Home vertical, and hosted shopping segments. She has nearly 15 years of experience working in the lifestyle space as a writer, editor, content strategist, director, on-camera talent, and publicist.

Balim Tezel (she/her) is a shopping updates editor at PS and the founder of Maison des Nus, a New York-based affordable luxury brand. She graduated from Northwestern University's Medill School of Journalism.
